entities.description: Arrested and booked for possession, manufacture, or sale of drugs in the past 12 months.
Arrested and booked for sex offenses excluding rape in the past 12 months.
Arrested and booked for fraud or stolen goods in the past 12 months.
Arrested and booked for some other offense in the past 12 months.
Combines all types of arrests and bookings in the past 12 months.
Being taken into custody by law enforcement.
Being officially charged with an offense and processed by law enforcement.
The specific type of criminal offense for which someone is arrested or booked.

relationships.description: Indicates that the individual was arrested in the past 12 months for drug-related offenses.
Indicates that the individual was booked in the past 12 months for drug-related offenses.
Indicates that the individual was arrested in the past 12 months for sex offenses.
Indicates that the individual was booked in the past 12 months for sex offenses.
Indicates that the individual was arrested in the past 12 months for fraud or stolen goods.
Indicates that the individual was booked in the past 12 months for fraud or stolen goods.
Indicates that the individual was arrested in the past 12 months for other specified offenses.
Indicates that the individual was booked in the past 12 months for other specified offenses.
Categorizes the type of offense for which the individual was arrested or booked in the past 12 months.
